title: YFP clan
selftext:
YFP is recruiting for NA   
ROAMERS/PVPERS requirements—over 1.5k hours can shoot all T2, T3 weapons have great ak and mp5 spray ready for PVP and be great with prim  
BUILDER requirements—have over 900 hours has many base designs, organize bases, and base designs for big groups.  
after the base is complete must be able to come roam with the group and be good with most T2, T3 guns  
FARMER requirements—over 600 hours, farm until group doesn't need more or group thinks they have enough farm.  
after farm runs can come roam with group and be good with most T2, T3 guns  
Other Requirements   
Good coms, a decent mic, take jokes, OVER THE AGE OF 15   
Dm me if interested
